General.Name: Saeron Auto
General.Description: Saeron Automotive Corporation manufactures and sells brake pads and linings, and rotor facings. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cheonan-si, South Korea. Saeron Automotive Corporation is a subsidiary of Nisshinbo Holdings Inc.
